english.segment1: We bow our hearts, we bend our knees. Oh Spirit, come make us humble. We turn our eyes from evil things. Oh Lord, we cast down our idols
english.segment2: So give us clean hands, give us pure hearts. Let us not lift our souls to another. Give us clean hands, give us pure hearts. Let us not lift our souls to another
english.segment3: We bow our hearts, we bend our knees. Oh Spirit, come make us humble. We turn our eyes from evil things. Oh Lord, we cast down our idols
english.segment4: So give us clean hands, give us pure hearts. Let us not lift our souls to another. Give us clean hands, give us pure hearts. Let us not lift our souls to another
english.segment5: And God, let us be a generation that seeks. Seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob. And God, let us be a generation that seeks. Seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob
english.segment6: You're my God, You're my God, oh oh
english.segment7: God, let us be a generation that seeks. Seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob. And God, let us be a generation that seeks. Seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob
english.segment8: And God, let us be a generation that seeks. Seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob. And God, let us be a generation that seeks. Seeks Your face, oh God of Jacob
english.segment9: Jesus, You are. You're my God, You're my God. You're my God, You're my God. You're my God
